metadata.title: CVE-2018-11802 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache Solr, the cluster can be partitioned into multiple collectionsand only a subset of nodes actually host any given collection. However, ifa node receives a request for a collection it does not host, it proxies therequest to a relevant node and serves the request. Solr bypasses allauthorization settings for such requests. This affects all Solr versionsprior to 7.7 that use the default authorization mechanism of Solr(RuleBasedAuthorizationPlugin).

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
